byline: David Gura, Stephen Dubner, Rob Schmitz, Jeff Tyler, Gigi Douban, Kai Ryssdal and Stacey Vanek Smith
title: Marketplace for Wednesday, May 1, 2013
description: We love zombies as much as the next show, but zombie inflation? In February, we declared inflation dead after years of easy monetary policy and negligible consumer price increases. Today, as the Federal Reserve concludes another meeting likely to keep inflation six feet under, we ask is it time to bring inflation back from the dead? Plus, more haunting news, Freakonomics Radio stops by to tell us how your advanced degree may be hurting your chances at a job. Over in China, a different version of Iron Man 3, catered to Chinese audiences, is set to release. What does that say about the Chinese film industry?
